Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Iranian \I*ra"ni*an\, a. Of or pertaining to Iran. -- n. A native of Iran; also, the Iranian or Persian language, a division of the Aryan family of languages, the modern version of which is called {Farsi}. [1913 Webster]
Farsi n 1: a person of Iranian descent; "many Farsi emigrated to India near Bombay" 2: the language of Persia (Iran) in any of its ancient forms [syn: {Persian}]
